column.comment: For sequence diagrams - stores sequence number
column.name: SeqNo

column.comment: Head style - filled, open ... depends on connector
column.name: HeadStyle

column.comment: Line is dot, dash... depends on connector
column.name: LineStyle

column.comment: Line style is bold or normal
column.name: IsBold

column.comment: Optional objectID that this diagram exists under - e.g.Sequence diagram under UseCase node
column.name: ParentID

column.comment: Numeric factor to apply to metric - accepts decimal fractions
column.name: NumericWeight

column.comment: Numeric weight tot apply to this type of problem
column.name: NumericWeight

column.comment: Numeric factor to apply to metric - accepts decimal fractions
column.name: NumericWeight

column.comment: Dash, dot ... depends on object - default = solid
column.name: BorderStyle

column.comment: Private data - may be used for different reasons by different object types
column.name: PDATA1

column.comment: Value to give this metric in this context
column.name: EValue

column.comment: Type of Object e.g Actor, UseCase, Class
column.name: ObjectType

column.comment: Factor to multiply complexty by for metrics
column.name: ComplexityWeight

column.comment: Numeric factor to apply to metric - accepts decimal fractions
column.name: NumericWeight

column.name: NumericWeight
